roleset.name: to make an attack, criticize strongly

example.name: autogen1
example.text: a hostile predator emerges for Saatchi & Saatchi Co.

example.name: autogen2
example.text: To fight off predators , B.A.T plans to spin off about $ 6 billion in assets , largely by selling such U.S. retailing units as Marshall Field and Saks and by floating its big paper and U.K. retailing business via share issues to existing holders .
